mapper.update: UPDATE sys_msg_send SET subject=#{subject,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , userId=#{userId,jdbcType=NUMERIC} , userName=#{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , messageType=#{messageType,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , content=#{content,jdbcType=CLOB} , contentText=#{contentText,jdbcType=CLOB} , sendTime=#{sendTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} , canReply=#{canReply,jdbcType=NUMERIC} , receiverName=#{receiverName,jdbcType=CLOB}, attachment=#{attachment,jdbcType=VARCHAR} WHERE id=#{id}
mapper.select: SELECT * from (SELECT a.id,a.SUBJECT,a.CONTENT,a.CONTENTTEXT,a.USERID,a.USERNAME,a.SENDTIME from sys_msg_send a where ID=#{msgId} UNION ALL SELECT b.ID,'' SUBJECT,b.CONTENT SUBJECT,b.CONTENT CONTENTTEXT,b.REPLYID USERID,b.REPLY USERNAME,b.REPLYTIME SENDTIME from sys_msg_reply b where b.MESSAGEID =#{msgId}) message ORDER BY message.SENDTIME

select count(1) num from sys_msg_send send left join sys_msg_read red on send.id=red.messageid and red.RECEIVERID=#{receiverId} , sys_msg_receiver rece where send.id=rece.messageid and (rece.receiverId in (select orgId from SYS_USER_POS where userId = #{receiverId}) or rece.receiverid=#{receiverId} )

select a.id, a.subject, a.userName, a.messageType, a.sendTime, a.canReply, a.receiverName ,a.content,a.attachment from sys_msg_send a,sys_msg_receiver b where a.id=b.messageid and (b.receiverid=#{receiverId} or b.receiverid in (select c.orgid from SYS_USER_POS c where c.userid=#{receiverId})) and not exists (select 1 from sys_msg_read d where a.id=d.messageid and d.receiverid=#{receiverId}) order by a.sendTime desc

select count(1) num from sys_msg_send a,sys_msg_receiver b where a.id=b.messageid and (b.receiverid=#{receiverId} or b.receiverid in (select c.orgid from SYS_USER_POS c where c.userid=#{receiverId})) and not exists (select 1 from sys_msg_read d where a.id=d.messageid and d.receiverid=#{receiverId})
